lyrics:
17 contributorstranslationsespañoldaydreaming lyricsverse 1
living in a city of sleepless people
who all know the limits and wont go too far
outside the lines
‘cause theyre out of their minds
i wanna get out and build my own home
on a street where reality is not much different
from dreams ive had
a dream is all i have

chorus
daydreaming
daydreaming all the time
daydreaming
daydreaming into the night
daydreaming
daydreaming all the time
daydreaming
daydreaming into the night
and im alright

verse 2
creep past the hours
like the shorter hand on the clock
hanging on a wall of a schoolhouse somewhere
we wait for the bell
and we dream of somewhere else
see paramore liveget tickets as low as 211you might also likechorus
daydreaming
daydreaming all the time
daydreaming
daydreaming into the night
daydreaming
daydreaming all the time
daydreaming
daydreaming into the night
and im alright

bridge
its not that i wont remember where im from
just dont want to be here no more
its not enough haahahahoh
were only half alive
im gonna go ohohohohoh
were only half alive
where the rest of the dreamers go ohohohohoh
were only half alive
where the dreamers go ohohohohoh
ohohooh

chorus
daydreaming
daydreaming all the time a dream is all i have
daydreaming
daydreaming into the night
and im alright

now im alright
